title: A Randomized Open-Label, Active-Controlled Multi-Center Study of LUP-223 (calcineurin inhibitor) in Patients With Irritable Bowel Syndrome
officialTitle: A Randomized Open-Label, Active-Controlled Multi-Center Study of LUP-223 (calcineurin inhibitor) in Patients With Irritable Bowel Syndrome
sponsor: Centre for Addiction and Mental Health
description: This is a randomized open-label, active-controlled multi-center study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of LUP-223 (calcineurin inhibitor) in patients with Irritable Bowel Syndrome. The study will enroll approximately 404 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 23-56 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Irritable Bowel Syndrome
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
